summary.span: 获取或设置列中的数据的最大大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, of the data within the column.

value.span: 列中的数据的最大大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, of the data within the column.

value.span: 默认值将根据参数值进行推断。

span.span: The default value is inferred from the parameter value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于二进制和字符串类型。The property is used for binary and string types. 对于非字符串数据类型和 ANSI 字符串数据，属性引用的字节数。For nonstring data types and ANSI string data, the property refers to the number of bytes. 对于 Unicode 字符串数据，指的字符数。For Unicode string data, refers to the number of characters. 字符串的计数不包括结尾的字符。The count for strings does not include the terminating character. 对于可变长度数据类型，描述数据传输到服务器的最大数量。For variable-length data types, describes the maximum amount of data to transmit to the server. 例如，对于 Unicode 字符串值，无法用于限制发送到服务器以首先一百个字符的数据量。For example, for a Unicode string value, could be used to limit the amount of data sent to the server to the first one hundred characters. 对于双向和输出参数和返回值，你必须设置的值。For bidirectional and output parameters, and return values, you must set the value of . 这不是必需的输入参数，并执行参数化的语句时如果未显式指定的参数的实际大小从推断设置，则该值。This is not required for input parameters, and if not explicitly set, the value is inferred from the actual size of the specified parameter when a parameterized statement is executed. 和参数属性可以通过设置推断。The and properties of a parameter can be inferred by setting . 因此，不需要指定它们。Therefore, you are not required to specify them. 但是，它们未公开在属性设置。However, they are not exposed in property settings. 例如，如果已推断出参数的大小，语句执行后，不包含推断的值。For example, if the size of the parameter has been inferred, does not contain inferred value after statement execution. 对于固定长度的值的数据类型，将被忽略。For fixed length data types, the value of is ignored. 它可以检索用于信息说明，并返回最大传输到服务器参数的值时，提供程序使用的字节数。It can be retrieved for informational purposes, and returns the maximum amount of bytes the provider uses when transmitting the value of the parameter to the server. 如果为提供的值的大小超过指定、的将包含指定的值，截断至的大小。If the size of the value supplied for a exceeds the specified , the of the will contain the specified value, truncated to the Size of the . 类型参数的`DbType`。`String`的值是以 Unicode 字符为单位的长度。For parameters of type `DbType`.`String`, the value of is length in Unicode characters. 类型参数的`DbType`。`Xml`，将被忽略。For parameters of type `DbType`.`Xml`, is ignored.

summary.span: 获取或设置源列的名称，该源列映射到 并用于加载或返回 。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the source column mapped to the and used for loading or returning the .

value.span: 映射到 的源列的名称。

span.span: The name of the source column mapped to the .

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置为任何内容而非空字符串，参数的值进行检索的列名称。When is set to anything other than an empty string, the value of the parameter is retrieved from the column with the name. 如果设置为`Input`，值取自。If is set to `Input`, the value is taken from the . 如果设置为`Output`，从数据源中获取的值。If is set to `Output`, the value is taken from the data source. A的`InputOutput`是这两者的组合。A of `InputOutput` is a combination of both. 有关如何使用属性，请参阅[DataAdapter 参数](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md)和[使用 Dataadapter 更新数据源](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md)。For more information about how to use the property, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md) and [Updating Data Sources with DataAdapters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md).

summary.span: 设置或获取一个值，该值指示源列是否可以为 null。

span.span: Sets or gets a value which indicates whether the source column is nullable.

summary.span: 这使得 能够正确地为可以为 null 的列生成 Update 语句。

span.span: This allows to correctly generate Update statements for nullable columns.

value.span: 如果源列可以为 null，则为 ；如果不可以为 null，则为 。

span.span: if the source column is nullable; if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由时处理可以为 null 的列正确生成更新命令。 is used by the to correctly generate update commands when dealing with nullable columns. 通常，使用的限制为开发人员从继承。Generally, use of is limited to developers inheriting from . 使用此属性来确定源列是否可以为 null，并将此属性设置为`true`是否可以为 null，和`false`如果它不是。 uses this property to determine whether the source column is nullable, and sets this property to `true` if it is nullable, and `false` if it is not. 当是生成其 Update 语句，它将检查每个参数。When is generating its Update statement, it examines the for each parameter. 如果属性是`true`，生成 WHERE 子句，如下所示 （在此查询表达式中，"FieldName"表示的字段名称）：If the property is `true`, generates a WHERE clauses like the following (in this query expression, "FieldName" represents the name of the field): ``` ((@IsNull_FieldName = 1 AND FieldName IS NULL) OR (FieldName = @Original_FieldName)) ``` 如果字段为`false`，生成以下 WHERE 子句：If for the field is `false`, generates the following WHERE clause: ``` FieldName = @OriginalFieldName ``` 此外，@IsNull_FieldName如果源字段包含 null 值和 0，如果它不包含 1。In addition, @IsNull_FieldName contains 1 if the source field contains null, and 0 if it does not. 此机制允许 SQL Server 中的一个性能优化，并提供的可以在多个提供程序的通用代码。This mechanism allows for a performance optimization in SQL Server, and provides for common code that works across multiple providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用期间操作，以确定是否将参数值设置为`Current`或`Original`。Used by during an operation to determine whether the parameter value is set to `Current` or `Original`. 这样可以更新主键。This lets primary keys be updated. 此属性设置为的新版由`DataRow.Item`属性，或方法对象。This property is set to the version of the used by the `DataRow.Item` property, or the method of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract object Value { get; set; }
.property instance object Value
Public MustOverride Property Value As Object
public: abstract property System::Object ^ Value { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the parameter.
An that is the value of the parameter.
The default value is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于输入参数的值绑定到，发送到服务器。For input parameters, the value is bound to the that is sent to the server. 对于输出参数和返回值参数，该数值将在完成后已关闭。For output and return value parameters, the value is set on completion of the and after the is closed. 当你向服务器发送 null 参数值时，必须指定，而不是 null。When you send a null parameter value to the server, you must specify , not null. 系统中的 null 值是一个不具有任何值的空对象。The null value in the system is an empty object that has no value. 用于表示 null 值。 is used to represent null values. 如果应用程序指定数据库类型，绑定的值转换为该类型时提供程序将数据发送到服务器。If the application specifies the database type, the bound value is converted to that type when the provider sends the data to the server. 提供程序尝试将任何类型的值的转换，如果它支持接口。The provider tries to convert any type of value if it supports the interface. 如果指定的类型不兼容的值，可能会导致转换错误。Conversion errors may result if the specified type is not compatible with the value. 属性可以推断出的值设置。The property can be inferred by setting the Value. 属性会被覆盖`DbDataAdapter.Update`。The property is overwritten by `DbDataAdapter.Update`.
